title: Spectating High-Elo
body:
I've recently realised that in the spectators box, where you can select one of five matches to spectate in a High-Elo match doesn't have any ranked games. Not that I spectate a lot, but since Season 6 officially begun, and new Champ Select and all, it's only been Normal games and ARAM games being able to spectate. 

Can someone please give some insight on this?

replies.body: Yes Please, I always use this feature to watch high elo ranked games!
Yeah, me too! Why can't I spectate some high elo ranked games as usual?
